description: After sharing a childhood enriched by their momâs Midwest-style home cooking, the Kriz Brothers together formed a dream to run a small business that would honor their love of food, family, and Colorado. Since 2014, Trevor, Josh & Tyler have been cruising Coloradoâs first and only pork centric food truck through Denver and serving a delicious fusion of Latin & North American cuisine. Taking locally sourced organic produce and steroid & antibiotic-free meat, they craft a seasonal menu that focuses on farm fresh tacos, sandwiches, and tasty treats. With the quality of flavor and service that you get from Colorado Pig Rig, you can count on this celebrated truck for every occasion, from private in home catering, weddings, corporate events, etcâ¦ this team is always happy to feed the masses.
name: The Colorado Pig Rig
